welcome_message_title: Welcome to San Juan de Dios
welcome_message_body: "Welcome to San Juan de Dios, Costa Rica! Get ready to be captivated by the city's charming atmosphere and immerse yourself in its rich cultural heritage. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that this beautiful city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tobias Bolaños International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Juan Santamaría International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Regional Terminal
terminals.description: The regional terminal at Juan Santamaría International Airport serves flights to and from other countries in Central America.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Guapiles Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Guapiles Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport for passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Quepos Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
